name: Lumberjackin' It (CuttleLich)
description:
Experience with nothing but your own phone the raw might of the lumberjack. Lumberjack it at home. Lumberjack it at work. Lumberjack it on the subway, in front of everyone.  

How to chop:

- Hold your phone vertically beside your head, with the screen parallel with your ear. 

- Swing your phone to be straight in front of you, with the screen facing upwards. 

- Repeat.

Credits:

Jaime Tous - Project Lead

Richie Berry - Gameplay Designer

Christian Birkett - Artist

Josh Wade - Gameplay Programmer

Utsab Das - Voice Acting

"His Last Share of the Stars" by Doctor Turtle - Menu Music

This game's core mechanic demands swinging your phone around. Please be careful with your electronics, especially around others.
